name: Croge
description: Croge is a unique cryptocurrency created on the Cronos network, characterized by its playful and engaging branding. It features a logo that closely resembles Dogecoin, and sets itself apart with its vibrant blue Cronos-themed color scheme. In short, it’s the blue Cronos version of Doge. Designed to leverage the security and efficiency of the Cronos blockchain, Croge aims to foster a community-driven environment where participants can engage with a fun and lighthearted digital currency on the Cronos network.
